For those with job satisfaction being low (A=0), the probability of air pressure being high (B=1) is 0.2881. 
For those with job satisfaction being high (A=1), the probability of air pressure being high (B=1) is 0.0833. 
For those with air pressure being low (B=0), the probability of stress level being high (C=1) is 0.3393. 
For those with air pressure being high (B=1), the probability of stress level being high (C=1) is 0.5456. 
For those with job satisfaction being low (A=0) and stress level being low (C=0), the probability of income level being high (D=1) is 0.6189. 
For those with job satisfaction being low (A=0) and stress level being high (C=1), the probability of income level being high (D=1) is 0.8090. 
For those with job satisfaction being high (A=1) and stress level being low (C=0), the probability of income level being high (D=1) is 0.5064. 
For those with job satisfaction being high (A=1) and stress level being high (C=1), the probability of income level being high (D=1) is 0.7279.
